Criminal news

In Novosibirsk, two recidivists were convicted of the massacre of a woman

The massacre of a woman took place in January 2022, and her house was broken into by convicts and stabbed and axe.

In Novosibirsk, a member of the Criminal Code was convicted of a smiling ice from the roof to the boy.

The woman was sentenced to one and a half years ' imprisonment with probation for one year

In Novosibirsk, they took out an illegal mobile gas station on the Sportsman Street.

Law enforcement officers initiated an administrative offence under the heading " Displacement "

In Novosibirsk, an electronic investigator went to help the police find criminals.

In Novosibirsk, the examination of the facial recognition system was completed, the neurosis nearly six months helped the police find criminals.

The Tatarska Novosibir province will be condemned for the creation of an underground casino.

The syber as the manager of the club organized and conducted gambling outside the gambling areas

Novosibirians will be convicted of the smuggling of Berez wood by 1.5 million roubles

According to the investigation, between November 2021 and January 2022, the accused smuggled more than 350 cubic metres of bereza.

Novosibir prosecutors asked 15.5 years for a girl's murderer in Lower Yeltsovka

The judge was removed to the courtroom for sentencing, and he was scheduled to be announced in early March 2024.

In Novosibirsk, criminal proceedings were initiated because of false prescriptions for Liriku.

No maladministers have been asked to medical organizations for forms, no doctors have been assisted

In Novosibirsk, the vehicle casserole was robbed in 1.5 years.

The defendant fully admitted and returned 100,000 roubles.

Novosibirian received 2.5 years of prison for shooting a similar gun.

The defendant did not deny or even compensate the victim for the moral damage of 800,000 roubles.

Novosibirtz was sentenced in Habarovska for attempting to sell mephedron and steal.

The court sentenced the sybirian to five and a half years of prison and also recovered 210,000 rubles in favour of the cellular store.

In Novosibirsk, the police detained a courier with a major mephedrone party.

A 36-year-old local resident detected 66 boilers in personal search.

In Novosibirsk, a robber ripped a bag of money from a woman's hands and escaped.

Suspect was apprehended, with regard to the figure, a non-resident subscription was used as a preventive measure.

In Novosibirsk, a 28-year-old master stole a TV from the lady's apartment.

The accused pleaded that he had repented, that the stolen property had been removed and returned to the victim.

Novosibirian got drunk four times driving, and now he's facing prison.

The prison in the criminal case is liable to up to two years ' imprisonment and to three years ' imprisonment.

A 28-year-old siber whispered a knife in the belly of a sausage.

Law enforcement officials have initiated criminal proceedings under the heading " Intentional infliction of serious harm to health " .

The head of CRR requested a report on the death of a boy during the Novosibirsk fire.

Investigative bodies are in the process of inspecting

The Court increased the punishment of the ex-Chief of the Iskit District for selling the island

Following an appeal by the Prosecutor ' s Office, Oleg Lagodu was sentenced to three years ' suspended imprisonment.

In Novosibirsk, a couple of lovers were caught stealing a warm shoe for a girl.

Detainees handed over to law enforcement officers, the amount of damage to the shop could have been 4,590 roubles

Novosibirsk started a resonant gas explosion trial on the Lina Street.

In the Novosibirsk District Court of Zaelzov, a high-profile case of gas explosion on the Lina Street began to be heard.

An old man of Novosibirsk sold another car in the parking lot of the house.

The defendant admitted that the money he made out of the sale was drunk, and he wasn't gonna steal the car.

A criminal case was brought against a newlywededed vehicle.

Now, for a sybirka, there is a risk of up to two years imprisonment.

Novosibirian stole coffee from the store and became a criminal figure.

In the case of an culprit, the court selected a non-resident detention measure, an investigation is continuing.

In Novosibirsk, a 20-year-old boy took a phone from a friend and escaped.

Suspect was apprehended, with regard to the figure, a non-resident subscription was used as a preventive measure.

In Novosibirsk, the accused began to be tried in a gas explosion on the Lina Street.

We will recall that the explosion on the street of Lina occurred on 9 February 2023, killing 15 people.

A 61-year-old police officer received 13.5 years of prison

The man was convicted in two separate articles, namely, " Attacking the life of a law enforcement officer " and " misleading report of an act of terrorism " .

The resident of Novosibir province will be convicted of deception when selling a kitten.

The Siberiac was charged under " Fraud " , the criminal case will be heard by the Togucin District Court

Novosibirsk arrested the mother of a baby found in a trash can.

In the courtroom, the accused fully pleaded guilty and will be detained until 17 April 2024

A 53-year-old siber found over 1,000 rounds and a revolver.

Novosibirtz is facing up to four years ' imprisonment for unlawful acquisition, possession, weapons, ammunition

Novosibirian threatened a similar machine and opened fire on his vehicle.

The defendant pleaded in part, and the criminal case is under investigation

The Novosibirian stabbed the collar because of the fight during the stalemate.

For the crime committed, a man will spend nine years in a strict regime colony

A 26-year-old siber stole a TV and three kilos of meat from the apartment.

Law enforcement officials have initiated criminal proceedings under the heading " Kraz " against a malicious man.

In Novosibirsk, a 40-year-old man stabbed a saucer.

Police officers detained a suspect in the commission of a crime and prosecuted him

In Novosibirsk, the mother of the baby found in the trash can was detained.

Turns out the girl was giving birth to a baby in a rented apartment of one of the houses on the street of 1905, where she lived.

Novosibirska was accused of brutal murder against a cohabitant.

At the request of the investigating judge, the court ordered the accused to be remanded in custody.

Novosibirsk saved a newborn child dumped in the trash.

Investigators initiated criminal proceedings under the heading " Killing a minor " , the circumstances of which are established

RPK 2024 Novosibirsk
State Internet channel "Russia." Founder is a federal State unitary enterprise, the Russian State Television and Radio Broadcasting Company (GTRC). Editor-in-Chief of the GIC Rossia-Panina Elena Valerevna. STRK editor, Maxim Valerjevic Beborov. Tel. +7 (383) 314-60-00. E-mail: panorama@nsk.rfn.ru. All rights to materials published on the site are protected under Russian and international intellectual property legislation. Any use of text, photo, audio and video materials is possible only with the concurrence of the law holder (AGTRC). For children over 16 (16+).

Policies of confidentiality
